content: Military Spec Ops certainly not my expertise but perhaps an idea outside the box.Has the military considered using Dogs to sniff out the enemy? The animals are more intelligent than we give them credit.Perhaps a gift of clothing to the Taliban with a certain scent? Perhaps a gift of their favorite meal containing a scent that would isolate them from the general population that would leak through the pores of their skin? They are loyal,hard working and can carry their own when it comes down to it,as well as their listening ability. I realize it would take some work in order to train to the level the Military would require,but just a thought and technique that is basic-like the enemy.
